conbody.p: (d) When notified by the SBA that it has filed an appeal with the Agency Head, follow 5319.810-90(b) to prepare an appeal file. Forward the appeal file through the SCO to SAF/SB (with a courtesy copy to the MAJCOM Small Business office) to arrive in SAF/SB within ten workdays after receipt of the formal appeal.
